SELECT r.reservation_code AS reservationCode, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, c.customer_code AS customerCode, c.dek_enc AS dekEnc, cc.contact_value_enc AS phoneEnc FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON p.property_code = r.property_code AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode}
JOIN customer c ON c.customer_code = r.customer_code JOIN customer_contact cc ON cc.customer_code = r.customer_code AND cc.is_primary = 1
WHERE r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM stay s WHERE s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
